title: Amazon Black Friday deals 2023 | The best cycling deals you can get right now
content:
Retail giant Amazon sells every type of product imaginable, and that includes bikes and cycling accessories.

Amazon has now launched its Black Friday cycling deals and there’s heavy discounting on indoor trainers, winter kit and accessories.

We’ve trawled Amazon to bring you the best Black Friday cycling deals.

Otherwise, check out our round-up of the best Black Friday bike deals, plus the latest offers on Garmin computers, smartwatches and bike lights.

Make sure to bookmark this page, because we’ll be updating it frequently to showcase the very best deals on cycling gear.

Jump straight to the best Amazon Black Friday deals

Where to find the best Black Friday deals 

These retailers offer Black Friday discounts on a huge range of cycling gear.

Black Friday cycling deals: UK quick links

  • Amazon – go to Amazon for a range of exciting deals on tech, accessories, clothing, and more
  • Chain Reaction – Offering up to 60 per cent off cycling gear including bikes, clothing, shoes and more
  • Wiggle – Offering up to 60 per cent off a huge range of cycle gear
  • Sigma Sports – Save up to 40% on a wide range of products, including clothing, helmets, smart trainers and cycling shoes
  • ProBikeKit – Offering 20-50 per cent off big brands
  • Decathlon – Get up to 50 per cent off cycling gear
  • Halfords – A wide range of Black Friday deals online, including discounts on nearly 100 cycling products
  • Tredz – ‘Black Ticket’ event with significant discounts on ‘nearly new’ ex-demo and ex-display bikes 
  • Evans Cycles – Black Friday sale and £50 voucher for every £250 spent
  • Merlin Cycles – Save up to 50 per cent on bikes and wheels, up to 70 per cent on frames, and up to 60 per cent on clothing
  • Trek Bikes – Save extra 40 per cent on sale with code BlackFriday40
  • Freewheel – Up to 60 per cent off
  • Ribble Cycles – Up to 20 per cent off bikes
  • Currys – The store’s Black Friday sale is underway
  • eBay – Reductions galore in the auction site’s Black Friday sale

Black Friday cycling deals: US quick links

  • Amazon – Daily discounts on tech, clothing, and accessories
  • Jenson USA – Save up to 65 per cent off
  • Rad Power Bikes – Offering up to $1,200 off every ebike
  • Competitive Cyclist – Now up to 50 per cent off bikes, with further discounts on Black Friday
  • Tweeks Cycles – Save up to 80 per cent

Best Amazon Black Friday deals

Garmin Index S2 Smart Scale – £129.99 £89.99 (save 31%)

Oscar Huckle / Our Media

The Garmin Index S2 Smart Scales can tell you your body fat percentage, skeletal muscle mass, bone mass and body water percentage, in addition to your weight.

The scales feature built-in WiFi so all your data can automatically sync with the Garmin Connect app.

The Index S2 Smart Scales are on offer this Black Friday in both black and white.

  • Buy the Garmin Index S2 Smart Scales on Amazon for £89.99

Moon Nebula rear light – £23.99 £18.49 (save 23%)

Dave Caudery / Immediate Media

Moon’s Nebula rear light sports eight modes and can dish out up to 200 lumens.

You get a daytime flash mode and the light can run up to 25 hours. The quick-release mount ensures it can mount on a range of seatposts, or on the back of your saddle and it even comes with a belt clip.

Discover more bike light deals this Black Friday with our roundup.

  • Buy the Moon Nebula rear light from Amazon for £18.49

Wahoo Kickr Core – £549.99 £499.99 (save 9%)

Our Media

The Wahoo Kickr Core was last updated in 2019, but it’s still a good choice today.

It’s available on Amazon now with a modest 9 per cent saving on the RRP, as quoted by Amazon.

Other sites (such as Tredz) have the RRP at £699.99, but are also selling the smart trainer for £499.99, so it’s actually a 28.57 per cent saving if you believe them.

  • Buy the Wahoo Kickr Core in the UK from Amazon for £499.99
  • Buy the Wahoo Kickr Core in the US with a 20% discount from Amazon for $479.99

Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Cycling Radar – £169.99 £129.99 (save 24%)

Garmin

Rearview radar bike lights will alert you to any vehicles approaching you from behind.

The Garmin RLT515 radar incorporates a taillight and can be paired with your Edge bike computer.

Garmin says it can also be used as a daytime running light, claiming it can provide visibility up to one mile.

  • Buy the Garmin Varia RTL515 in the UK from Amazon for £129.99
  • Buy the Garmin Varia RTL515 in the US from Amazon for $149.99

Peaty’s Complete Bicycle Cleaning Kit – £79.99 £56.99 (save 29%)

Peaty's

This complete cleaning kit from Peaty’s includes everything you’ll need to keep your bike running in tip-top condition.

In the kit, you get Peaty’s Loam Foam bike cleaner, a 500ml bottle of Foaming Degreaser and a 60ml bottle of the brand’s Link Lube All-Weather. You also get two brushes and a cleaning cloth.

Everything’s neatly stored in a recycled plastic box with an aluminium carry handle.

  • Buy the Peaty’s Complete Bicycle Cleaning Kit from Amazon for £56.99

Garmin Tacx Neo 2T Smart Trainer Bundle – $1,189 $1049 (save 12%)

We rated the Tacx Neo 2T 4.5 stars, making it one of the best smart trainers of 2023. Boasting spaceship aesthetics, compact folding, and a virtual flywheel that redefines the training experience, the Neo 2T delivers realism and fun for cyclists seeking top-tier performance.

Make sure to check out our comprehensive guide if you’re looking for more turbo trainer deals.

  • Buy the Garmin Tacx Neo 2T Smart Trainer in the US from Amazon for $1049

Garmin Fenix 7 – £599.99 £399 (save 33%)

In our review of the solar version of the Garmin Fenix 7, we applauded its robust training and tracking capabilities, supporting interval workouts and tracking performance insights using its optical heart rate monitor.

With familiar smartwatch features such as notifications, contactless payments and music storage, it seamlessly blends fitness functionality with everyday convenience.

For more smartwatch savings, be sure to check out our comprehensive round-up of the best Garmin Black Friday deals.

  • Buy the Garmin Fenix 7 in the UK from Amazon for £399
  • Buy the Garmin Fenix 7 in the US from Amazon for $449.99

Park Tool OM-1 Bench Top Overhaul Mat – £31.99 £23.48 (save 27%)

Park Tool

A bench mat is an invaluable accessory for keeping small parts organised when servicing headset bearings, hubs or pedals, for example.

The textured areas keep small parts in place and the divided sections mean you won’t mix anything up. As well as looking good on your workbench, Park Tool says the rubber construction cleans easily.

  • Buy the Park Tool OM-1 from Amazon for £23.48

Muc-Off Wet Lube – £9.62 £6.85 (save 25%)

Zetland Cycles / Immediate Media

Muc-Off’s Wet Lube is a tried-and-tested chain lube, with the brand claiming the specific formula excels over long distances in wet or muddy conditions. It currently has 22 per cent on Amazon.

  • Buy the Muc-Off Wet Lube from Amazon for £6.85

Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge – £32.99 £20.99 (save 36%)

James Huang/BikeRadar

Tyre pressure gauges help you ensure you have the exact amount of air you are aiming for in each tyre, offering greater accuracy than a traditional track pump.

Topeak’s Smart D2 gauge can read up to 250psi and will work with both Presta and Schrader valves on mountain bike tyres, suspension forks and rear shocks.

  • Buy the Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge in the UK from Amazon for £20.99
  • Buy the Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge in the US from Amazon for $29.97

Gore Wear Spirit winter cycling jacket – £149.99 £92.98 (save 38%)

Amazon

The Spirit is a Gore-Tex Infinium-lined windproof and water-resistant winter cycling jacket designed for a wide range of conditions.

The jacket is available with a hefty 51 per cent discount in four different colours.

It’s rare to see cycling jackets discounted so heavily in the winter and stock is limited, so we’d recommend acting quickly on this one.

  • Buy the Gore Wear Spirit jacket in the UK from Amazon for £92.98
  • Buy the Gore Wear Spirit jacket in the US from Amazon for $112.50

Peloton Bike+ – £1,995 £1,560 (save 22%)

The Peloton Bike+ is now available with 20 per cent off on Amazon, with a 24in HD screen and access to Peloton’s extensive library of fitness content.

However, if you’re uncertain, discover the pros and cons of Zwift vs Peloton to aid your decision-making.

  • Buy the Peloton Bike+ in the UK from Amazon for £1,560

Kryptonite Evolution chain lock – £99.20 £57.99 (save 42%)

Amazon

If you want to keep your bike safe, you could do worse than a big ol’ Kryptonite chain.

Kryptonite makes some of the best bike locks on the market, with the Evolution scoring 8/10 on the brand’s own security ratings. Paired with a solid U-lock, this will be a formidable opponent for any bike thief.

  • Buy the Kryptonite Evolution chain lock in the UK from Amazon for £57.99
  • Buy the Kryptonite Evolution chain lock in the US from Amazon for $75.71

Shimano MX100 Unisex Off-Road Cycling Shoes – $80 $48 (save 40%)

Many of the best cycling shoes are made by Shimano, a brand that consistently offers quality and durability. The MX100 Unisex off-road shoes are no exception, combining rugged durability with a versatile design tailored for off-road cycling enthusiasts seeking performance and comfort on diverse terrain.

  • Buy the Shimano MX100 Unisex Off-Road Cycling Shoes in the US from Amazon for $48

Altura Men’s Progel Plus Bib Shorts  – £60 £23.49 (save 61%)

Altura

If you’re after a cheap set of bib shorts to add to your wardrobe and you happen to be a size large, these Altura Men’s Progel Plus bib shorts are likely to be a solid option.

Altura says its Progel pad has been engineered using Italian materials and an innovative moulded design exclusive to the brand. The brand has paid attention to make the bib straps soft-feeling and there’s elasticated leg grippers to keep the shorts in place.

  • Buy the Altura Men’s Progel Plus Bib Shorts on Amazon for £23.49

High5 Zero Electrolyte Hydration Tablets – £58.99 £23.96 (save 59%)

Electrolyte tablets are very useful to replace the salt lost through sweat when you ride. Simply drop one or two tabs (depending on how strong a flavour you prefer) into a bottle of water before you head off on a ride.

You can save almost 60 per cent on an eight-pack of High5 Zero Electrolyte Hydration Tablets in the Orange / Cherry, Blackcurrant Citrus, Mango, Pink Grapefruit and Tropical variants.

  • Buy the High5 Zero Electrolyte Hydration Tablets on Amazon for £23.96

When is Black Friday 2023?

Black Friday hits on November 24th this year, but deals are already dropping in stores and online. Keep your eyes peeled before the best bargains start to go out of stock!

How to get a good deal on Black Friday 2023

  • Research pays off: Check online reviews before buying to uncover potential issues behind hefty discounts.
  • Plan ahead: Create a wishlist to avoid impulsive decisions and regrets.
  • Beware of exaggerated price drops: Retailers often use outdated RRPS to make a deal seem more impressive. We track discounts to ensure you’re truly getting the best deal this Black Friday.

Why Black Friday?

Emerging post-Thanksgiving, Black Friday initially used alluring sales to get people into stores. However, the rise of online shopping allowed people to snag deals without budging from the couch, helping Black Friday become a huge event worldwide.

The frenzy not only expanded over the weekend to Cyber Monday, but also ignited a race among retailers, pushing them to roll out discounts earlier in November to outmanoeuvre competitors and amp up sales.

So, if you’re on the lookout for top-notch cycling gear, Black Friday is a great opportunity to scout out the best bargains and elevate your cycling experience without breaking the bank.
